title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas reunite in LA after three weeks apart and hold hands on dinner date
text:
They've been apart due to their busy work schedules.

But on Wednesday night, Priyanka Chopra, 37, and Nick Jonas, 27, were reunited in LA.

The couple, who will celebrate their first wedding anniversary in December, enjoyed dinner out together in Beverly Hills.

Reunited: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas held hands as they left a restaurant in Beverly Hills on Wednesday night after their busy work schedules kept them apart for three weeks

The actress and the musician, who have spent the past three weeks apart, held hands as they left the restaurant.

Priyanka has been traveling to promote her Hindi-language movie The Sky Is Pink, first in her native India and then in New York.

Nick, meanwhile, is touring with brothers Joe and Kevin as the Jonas Brothers continue their Happiness Begins series of concerts.

On Tuesday night, they played San Francisco and their next gig will be in Vancouver, Canada, on Friday.

Couple: The actress, 37, flashed cleavage in a long-sleeved patterned top that she paired with black jeans. The musician, 27, wore a logo'd sweatshirt and faded jeans along with trainers

The former Quantico star flashed cleavage in a form-fitting long-sleeved patterned top that she paired with black jeans.

She tucked her jeans into shiny black leather ankle boots and carried a large black tote.

Her shoulder-length hair was loose and she added a splash of color with red lipstick.

The musician also went with black for his evening attire, choosing a logo'd sweatshirt and faded jeans along with trainers.

Back in LA: Priyanka and Nick, who will celebrate their first wedding anniversary in December, chatted with a couple of friends before heading home

The couple tied the knot in a lavish extravaganza including Christian and Hindu ceremonies that took place over several days in the Indian city of Jodhpur.

In an interview on NBC's Today on Tuesday morning, the actress said she 'really can't wait' to have children with the Jonas Brother.

'I mean, there's so much that happens in our lives that whenever God blesses us with that it's something that we both definitely want,' she explained.

Meanwhile, Nick's brother Joe also took advantage of a short break in their tour schedule and headed to the LA Dodgers MLB play-off game against the Washington Nationals.

Joe, who was without wife sophie Turner, was in for a disappointment; the Dodgers lost game 5.
description: The couple, who will celebrate their first wedding anniversary in December, were snapped leaving a restaurant in Beverly Hills.
